website_summaries.verdict: It has some nice features and  a superb warranty, but the quality concerns may result in it not meeting users' expectations in some circumstances.
pros: Sports an aluminum body coated in titanium for added durability
Has a mid-level price and a lifetime warranty
cons: Known durability issues with the cap O ring – tends to dislodge/fall out
Glass breaker is not as heavy-duty as other models

customer_reviews.title: The pen IS mightier than the sword....
customer_reviews.text: This fine pen can be used as a weapon?! Who knew?! Great quality, and it writes nicely, too. Important note: If you ever have to break the glass in your car with the pen to escape, always strike the glass in a corner of the window, not the middle. The glass is much more likely to break with a corner strike. Jus' sayin'....
customer_reviews.author: sightgeist310

customer_reviews.title: Garbage.
customer_reviews.text: I carried the Hoffman Richter pen for less than a month. The pen broke at the threads. I emailed the company multiple times and they never responded to my emails. Save your money and don't buy this garbage.
customer_reviews.author: MCLOAD87

customer_reviews.title: Loctite it down!
customer_reviews.text: The pen worked.... I havent gotten the chance to bust open a car window to save a baby stuck in a hot car, or to defend a damsel in destress against a troupe? (hoard? BABEL??) of ninjas yet, and probably never will. Not because those scenarios dont happen in real life, but because the butt plate came unscrewed while riding my motorcycle, and was sacrificed to the road gods along with the pocket clip, so now I dont carry it. If you make the purchase, grab some Loctite and lock that thing into place. Never know when you might run into a gaggle of ninjas trapped in a hot car, or a rampaging damsel molesting a baby!
customer_reviews.author: James Roberts

customer_reviews.title: sturdy, item that I will enjoy carrying at all ...
customer_reviews.text: This is an extremely well made item that everyone should have on them at all times. When a gun or knife is just not practical, this could very well save your life. This is a well made, sturdy, item that I will enjoy carrying at all times for a very long time. I highly recommend this to all of my current or former LEO brothers and sisters as well as any civilian interested in protecting themselves.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Bonsall

customer_reviews.title: Not as advertised
customer_reviews.text: Don't trust this as a emergency glass breaker I tested it on sever Windows at the junkyard with enough strength to flatten the tip with out any damage to the glass, this might work better as just a pen. Self defense ya but any pen can be used as self defense I wanted a escape from bad situation pen, but you would be better off not wasting your money if your looking for a true emergency glass breaker/SD/pen. Don't buy this
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: So Loveable... Until it dies!
customer_reviews.text: I have been carrying and enjoying this pen for 3 years. Loved it. However, the O-ring that secures the cap to the main body fell out. Now the pen won’t stay together at all. This is a HUGE design issue. What was and still is within my heart my favorite pen is now no more. Like it or not, I suppose the only way around this is to go for a tactical pen model that screws together with threads. If you buy this pen and actually carry and use it, do so with the understanding that the O-ring is its achilles heel.
customer_reviews.author: awallen

customer_reviews.title: Best Tactical Pen Ever, Now 50% Off!!!
customer_reviews.text: I own quite a few Tactical items, especially pens. This is by far the best Tactical Pen I've ever seen or used. It's completely inconspicuous & if need be, easy to conceal. The parts & construction of the pen is super high quality. The pen is comfortable to carry, write with, and just plain feels good in your hand. Happily, this pen is now priced 50% less than it was just a few months ago. It makes a great Christmas gift for those we love and would like to keep safe...That's a lot of gift and peace of mind for $20. Can you afford not to give this Pen to loved ones for the Holidays?
customer_reviews.author: DJSTEVEZ

customer_reviews.title: Oops! Can't Fly with this Pen Anymore
customer_reviews.text: Love this pen. Have had it for 4 years. It used to be advertised as guaranteed to get through TSA security. NOT anymore. I've flown with my Hoffman-Richter pen at least half a dozen times, but today, at BWI, some idiot TSA agent called it "Kubaton" and confiscated it. Oh well. I love this pen so much that I'll order another one on the second to last day of my trip, and it will be waiting for me when I get home. (I did make TSA doofus let me take my brand new space pen refill out of it though.)
customer_reviews.author: R. McLean

customer_reviews.title: Was great at first
customer_reviews.text: Was great at first, then as I have discovered with every tactical pen so far, after daily use I found its flaw. The inside seal which makes the cap stay on falls off, easy enough to put back on until it falls off and you can't find it. Would not recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Jesse

customer_reviews.title: Glad I got it
customer_reviews.text: This is a high-quality pen with excellent machining. You may be somewhat surprised by its size and weight once you get it in your hand but you'll be pleased by thought of it as a tactical/life-saving device. The ink cartridge is lousy but that, hopefully, is something you can upgrade through direct purchase. I don't think it's a good shirt pocket pen but I've clipped it in my pants pocket and have found that to be practical and comfortable. The click off/on cap is very firm and those with a light grip/muscle may find it bothersome.
customer_reviews.author: Nicholas V. Kroeze

customer_reviews.title: Good pen.  Best customer service!
customer_reviews.text: Clip broke first day I carried. Contacted seller via Amazon to see if they want to simply send me a new clip. I like the form factor and the included pen cartridge writes well. I went ahead and ordered refills knowing that I like the way it writes. Will update when, and if, I hear from seller. Aside from the clip issue, it deserves a 5 star rating. Update: Contacted seller and they responded same day and made it right. Outstanding customer service! I liked that they asked for photos of the damaged part to pass on their technical staff. Indicates to me that they have a solid quality control plan.
customer_reviews.author: gordon

customer_reviews.title: This one exceeded my expectations
customer_reviews.text: Excellent workmanship. I have no doubt this would make short work of a car window in an emergency. The clip is large enough to fit your belt if you choose to carry it that way. I like that you don't have to unscrew the cap to get to the pen. At 6 1/4 inches overall, I thought it would wobble around in a smaller shirt pocket but the clip holds it securely if clipped on one side or the other.
customer_reviews.author: B.H.

customer_reviews.title: Almost Too Big
customer_reviews.text: If I could give this 3 1/2 stars I would. I like the design and shape and the clip is great for almost any application. Two things though - this is the longest and thickest tactical pen I've purchased to date. It's almost a full inch longer than ALL the other pens I have. It's also thicker. So, if that's what you're looking for this could be great for you. While the cap snaps on to both ends securely, if you shake it, there's an annoying little rattle. Overall, it's a good pen, and I'll find a use for it, but it's just SO much bigger than it needs to be.
customer_reviews.author: Jeffery Sullivan

customer_reviews.title: A Robust, Solid, Well-Balanced, Beautifully Finished Tactical Pen
customer_reviews.text: Robust, solid build, well-balanced, nicely finished. Easy to grasp and possesses a good weight balance for use both as a defensive tool or as a writing implement. The item is quite inconspicuous, and functions admirably as an everyday pen. The built-in glass-breaking feature is a very welcome bonus for use in emergency automobile evacuation. I reviewed a significant number of tactical pens currently offered for sale, and chose the Hoffman Richter as being the most suitable for my personal use. After receiving and using it for several days, I feel certain that I have chosen wisely. Offered at a very reasonable price, the pen is also covered by a lifetime warranty. It was delivered promptly in excellent condition.
customer_reviews.author: Gerry

customer_reviews.title: Needs super glue
customer_reviews.text: This pen fell apart in my front pocket. The threads worked loose where you insert the pen refill. The pocket clip threads also worked loose. I hit both with super glue. I'll worry about it when the pen needs a refill, but I carry it mainly for self defense. I really like it otherwise, especially compared to competitor products.
customer_reviews.author: K. Pelletier

customer_reviews.title: Need to re-design
customer_reviews.text: The best feature is the material its made of. I edited my stars from 5 to 2 stars due to the instability of the item. Because of the placement of the threads there's no sleeve or collar to hold those threads in place therefore stripping and not allowing any of the top piece to thread in and screw properly to a tight fit. The defense portion of this item is excellent but once again, due to the lack of being able to keep the threads in the same place after high impact, only allows a half a turn or less for the threads to connect.
customer_reviews.author: David A.

customer_reviews.title: Great pen & Customer support
customer_reviews.text: I love this pen, I use it all day long on my delivery route, it's very hardy, writes great and has an awesome clip! Also, I'm buying another just for the Customer Support, these guys are A double A+, amazing, forever customer now, thank you!
customer_reviews.author: Greg Costello

customer_reviews.title: It writes great. It's the sturdiest pen I've found
customer_reviews.text: Coolest tactical pen on the planet. I use this all the time. It writes great. It's the sturdiest pen I've found. I have found out that this type of "Kubota" does a lot of damage if needs be. A yawara would be better for simple self-defense. It holds up well and has a blunt flat end or hard point to be as destructive as you need to be in a life-threatening situation.
customer_reviews.author: Hilary Lavender

customer_reviews.title: Amazing Multipurpose Product
customer_reviews.text: I received this Tactile Pen as a gift from my brother to use while I am traveling as a security measure and it quickly became my favorite travel tool. It is very functional and delightful as a writing instrument in any position or weather condition, and i have received many compliments on the overall look and feel of the pen. The real hidden gem of it being a defensive or emergency tool should not be overlooked though, and functions very well in that space as well. I have since bought and gifted this pen to several other friends and family members
customer_reviews.author: Dean DeMarco

customer_reviews.title: Comparison between the initial offering and the current offering.
customer_reviews.text: The current rendition that I recently received, is inferior to the one I initially received. The tactical pen initially came with one o-ring in the cap. It came off with a slight pull and went back on with a positive click. The new model has three o-rings, and requires a strong pull and enough of a twist to start to unscrew the pen case. When the cap is replaced on the pen, it has a sticky, squishy feel to it. The initial offering rates five stars, but the current offering only rates three stars.
customer_reviews.author: Rodney White

customer_reviews.title: but doesn't want to stock up on a bunch of usually useless gear, this is your pen
customer_reviews.text: If you're one of those people who wants to prepare themselves for emergencies, but doesn't want to stock up on a bunch of usually useless gear, this is your pen. Good pen, but also breaks glass and can be turned into a weapon in short order. Just make sure you go to the site and follow the instructions on how to hold the weapon pen.
customer_reviews.author: Mark R. Kregel

customer_reviews.title: Disappointing
customer_reviews.text: Spent a little extra money and got this pen because of the reviews. Had it for maybe a month and the o-ring fell out the cap and I can't put it back in. I always carried it with me but acctully used the pen maybe one or twice.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Falls apart after a month or two.
customer_reviews.text: Bought the pen 12 Oct 2017. Looked like my old version. Ink didn’t work so I replaced it....wrote fine. Right after Thanksgiving the rubber seal inside fell out. Pen wouldn’t stay together. My fault I ignored the stars. 1 Bad star compared to the 600 who said it was great! If you click on the 1 Star survey it brings up 30+... I’m past the 30-day period...can’t return....AVOID THIS PEN!
customer_reviews.author: Mike C.

customer_reviews.title: Great clip, great writing
customer_reviews.text: Great clip, great writing, superb for defense (due to size and shape). Overall, an outstanding tactical pen... except... The cap wobbles... annoying so when using it as a writing instrument, and somewhat when using as a tactical device. Engineering needs to fix this. I would not recommend this pen, nor purchase it again, based simply on the wobbling cap.
customer_reviews.author: Hennessey

customer_reviews.title: Great pen, sturdy well built
customer_reviews.text: Great pen, sturdy well built. Never had to use as a "tactical" instrument and won't get to. After 2 years travel through many airports, TSA just confiscated it, saying it was a martial arts weapon. In the outbound airport it was ok, return airport it was a weapon???
customer_reviews.author: DM3404

customer_reviews.title: ... The Best Yet. Save yourself the headache and buy this pen first.
customer_reviews.text: This is my 3rd tactical pen and easily eclipses other brands in quality and build with no reasonable comparison. This is Nice Pen! ... I've used Sharp, Bill Blass, and Cross pens in a regular office environment and somehow seem to eventually destroy them with no effort at all. Due to the previously mentioned issues, I have attempted to use other similar products to this and found them to be no more durable than the regular pens noted above. This is an extremely high quality, well balanced writing instrument that is ideal for daily office use. This is, by far, the nicest pen of its type that I've used...EVER.
customer_reviews.author: LJ PACK

customer_reviews.title: Don’t buy
customer_reviews.text: Originally gave this 4 stars but have to revise down to 1. After infrequent light use (as a pen only) over the last year, the cap won’t stay on. The cap is held on by a rubber o-ring inside the cap. If it comes out, which mine did with normal infrequent use, the lid is too loose to stay on. It’s impossible to fix. I originally bought 4 of them for gifts and only 1 didn't have a leaky ink stick. Won’t buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Jeremy

customer_reviews.title: Love this pen
customer_reviews.text: Love this pen! I get compliments and a buzz about it. Only CON I noticed was the O-ring gets dislodged off its place when it gets dried up. I almost lost it twice when I opened the cap and it flew out of it. Make sure you lube it up with oil at times.
customer_reviews.author: MJ

customer_reviews.title: A little disappointed.
customer_reviews.text: It seems tough, and heavy enough to do what the ad says it will do, but the lid to body link design is weak. The only thing that holds it (friction) is a rubber o-ring. It's not sufficient to keep them connected in my pants pocket. Disappointed about that. I'll have to figure out another way to keep it together.
customer_reviews.author: Montana Wildman

customer_reviews.title: This item and my switch blade knife are better than nothing if there is a problem
customer_reviews.text: I keep this in my desk drawer, because I work in a high crime area and the company has a no gun on premises policy. This item and my switch blade knife are better than nothing if there is a problem. The only issue I had was with the Parker QuinkFlow Ink Refills (which I purchased from Amazon - 6 refills for $6.60). I would have given 5 stars but the tip of the pen for some reason was just a hair too small for the refills. I used a 7/64" drill bit to enlarge the pen opening. The spring and pen fit perfectly, which meant that I would not have to return with the lifetime warranty.
customer_reviews.author: JM

customer_reviews.title: Threads wore out after four months
customer_reviews.text: This pen looked great and wrote great and took Fisher Space Pen refills. However, it only lasted about four months. I keep it in my front pants pocket and the threads that hold the two pieces together wore to the point where it couldn't be screwed shut anymore. I might guess that the problem is the bending style stresses of life in the front pocket. Other than the fact that it couldn't be used after four months, it was fine.
customer_reviews.author: jjd

customer_reviews.title: Great customer service
customer_reviews.text: There is a small O ring seal in the cap of the pen that can become (did become) dislodged rendering the product useless. I was able to get seal back into the notch of the cap. I feel this is a poor design. However I experienced the best customer service from SurvivalLife, outstanding, highly recommend them they went above and beyond. I emailed them about the issue and they sent a new pen. Way to stand behind your product well done. Jonathan
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: ... as a Christmas present and he seems to really like it! It's a good
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my boyfriend as a Christmas present and he seems to really like it! It's a good, solid weight-- I can see it potentially really hurting someone if used for self defense. He dropped it getting out of the car and it got scratched, so that's what the docked star is for, but I'm sure it will end up banged up and scratched when he actually gets to using it.
customer_reviews.author: Khristine Lizada

customer_reviews.title: Would buy again
customer_reviews.text: Writes good & can take a beating. I've had mine for a while (I don't leave reviews right away) and I take it everywhere. No issues yet with any type of security having an issue with me carrying it.
customer_reviews.author: Rob S.

customer_reviews.title: Does the job.
customer_reviews.text: I have been meaning to pick up a self defense pen for a long time. Just a leg up, should worst come to worst in a situation where my other options have been limited. I am impressed with this, I picked it up on the 'cheap' on one of Amazon's Daily Deals for under $20 and it is worth that. I wouldn't pay $50 to $100 for some of the more talked about brands for prestige, just get this one. It gets the job done, and is nicely made.
customer_reviews.author: Angevin

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: Love this thing. Easy to integrate into EDC. Very effective. I have tested penetration with layers of cardboard. Very pleased. It'll get the job done. Also breaks glass with ease. Oh yeah, the pen writes well, too.
customer_reviews.author: Palanthis

customer_reviews.title: I like the feel and weight of the pen
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this pen as a gift. I have previously purchased one for my self. I like the feel and weight of the pen. It writes well and you can easily find refills at Staples or Office Max. It is a great pen and I highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Michael M

customer_reviews.title: Just ok
customer_reviews.text: If you were buying just for self-defense, it would be okay. Not something I'd want to rely on to save my life. But if you're buying it to use as a pen, that partly is a little bit to be desired
customer_reviews.author: Boone

customer_reviews.title: The pen is great, and it feels great to write with
customer_reviews.text: The pen is great, and it feels great to write with. However, after taking it through airport security several times with no problem, it was confiscated the last time I tried to take it on a plane. The CRKT pen made it through dozens of times and looks more like a regular pen, so i think it's a safer bet.
customer_reviews.author: Jenifer Diaz

customer_reviews.title: tac pen that is a great writing tool
customer_reviews.text: great tactical pen. I wanted a pen that was a little bit smaller than some of the others. dont get me wrong its not small, but it is smaller than others I have seen. I also like that it has a cap. I remove the cap during the day and clip it to my pocket. This makes the pen the same size as a normal pen and not so heavy. It can be used as a tac pen either way. The pen writes great! It it one of my favorite writing pens and refills are easy to get. It uses Schneider slider 755 refills. It has the feel of a pen with a much higher price point.
customer_reviews.author: Cameron

customer_reviews.title: satisfaction
customer_reviews.text: I am very pleased with the Hoffman Richter Stinger Tactical Pen and Survival Glass Breaker for Discreet Self Defense. I bought it in case I needed to break a car window, if I needed to. The weight of the pen impressed me. It has some real heft to it.. I gave several to my family this past Christmas. They also were very impressed.
customer_reviews.author: Kathleen Johnson   for the Joby JB01237-CAM GorillaPod Original Tripod

customer_reviews.title: junk....don't waste your money! !!!
customer_reviews.text: I took the cap off of the pen three times. On thev third time, a small rubber grommet fell out and now the cap won't lock back. This is a piece of junk. Don't waste your money on it! !!!!
customer_reviews.author: Michael Mason

customer_reviews.title: Top heavy and too long
customer_reviews.text: Writes nice but is top heavy with the cap positioned to expose the pen tip. It practically falls out of my hand. To counteract this, leave the cap off when writing but that's more than a little inconvenient at times. With the cap covering the writing tip, pen is too long to keep in a shirt pocket. It's OK, not worth the trouble to return, but there are better options out there for the same price.
customer_reviews.author: Evan

customer_reviews.title: Just as advertised
customer_reviews.text: Even for a tactical pen it's on the larger/heavier side but if you're to that then it's perfect. If you're not into that then it's still perfect otherwise.
customer_reviews.author: Scott Szabo

customer_reviews.title: Impressive
customer_reviews.text: Impressively built: it fits the hand well and the business end has enough of a point to be effective. It's not obvious in the pictures, but the clip is as sturdy as the rest of the pen. It's not going to twist or bend out of shape. The pen writes as well as any premium pen, though naturally enough, not as comfortably. This is real winner.
customer_reviews.author: Mark J. Anderson

customer_reviews.title: Great response to issue with Hoffman richter would buy again
customer_reviews.text: Packaging was great and item was as describe, I did have an issue with the stringer after the second day at work using the pen. The thread would not hold together and kept popping off every time I pulled it from my pocket and it had been tightened properly as well . Contacted seller and manufacturer who responded in incredible timing. I will be receiving another replacement in a few days. Great service.
customer_reviews.author: Alex

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic pen/defensive weapon
customer_reviews.text: If this is all you had to defend yourself with from an attacker, you could do a lot worse. This pen has a very hard tip. If you stabbed someone in the head with this pen, it wouldn't take many blows to bring an attacker to his knees. I like this pen so much I bought two more the next day.
customer_reviews.author: Robert Curley Jr.

customer_reviews.title: I read lots of good reviews, but I'm not impressed
customer_reviews.text: I read lots of good reviews, but I'm not impressed. The cap does not fit tightly and securely on the pen, either to cap the pen or if you just want to post the cap on the back while writing . . . the cap wobbles noticeably in both configurations. I'm not sure if this would significantly affect the amount of force applied if you hit something hard, but still I can feel it moving around inside my fist and it just feels cheap and unreliable.
customer_reviews.author: Tim

customer_reviews.title: Makes you feel downright accountable or something
customer_reviews.text: Makes you want to smite someone. Well, not really, but it looks cool and I wouldn't want to be on the receiving end of it, if someone decided they wanted to smite with it. I will, however, carry it right next to my pepper spray, collapsible baton, kung-fu book, Glock, and German Shepherd. Well, you know, I don't carry a 100-lb German Shepherd. But I'm trying to train him to carry all this other stuff.
customer_reviews.author: Bill

customer_reviews.title: Nice
customer_reviews.text: This is nice but the tip is a not as sharp as I would like for maximum impact if I were to need to use it to defend myself. The thickness of the pen, and the way it feels in my hand, is pretty good overall. Nice product!
customer_reviews.author: Buzzy

customer_reviews.title: Watch for the TSI Officers!!!
customer_reviews.text: I personally loved the pen until it was confiscated at Corpus Christi Airport on the way to take care of my dying father. I would like my money or the pen replaced as it was advertisedone as TSI safe!!
customer_reviews.author: Keith Alves

customer_reviews.title: A premium pen and defensive tool!
customer_reviews.text: I love this pen. It writes great and is on par with oher premium pens in this price catagory. It is sturdy and solid. The cap snaps on solidly and flush to both ends. The sharp end of the sword is enough for tactical needs but not so much to harm oneself. While I have not tested the tactical capabilities, I am more than confident it will function as advertised. This is a must have when unable to carry a knife or handgun.
customer_reviews.author: Chuck Seton

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: Ordered two different tactical pens. the Hoffman Richter was slightly larger, a plus, and very well made. Like the flat top as opposed to a rounded top for resting my thumb. Highly recommended. Received an email from the seller mentioning a lifetime guarantee and offering to answer any questions or provide support required. First rate service!
customer_reviews.author: George

customer_reviews.title: Too Big? I say....NO
customer_reviews.text: I love this tactical pen! Some have said it is too long but it seems perfect length for me. As a pen it writes really well. One critique is that "as a pen" it feels slightly long. But I'm not using it to write a novel (Newsflash: we have computers now!) and for what I use it for, I notice its size but it really doesn't bother me too much.
customer_reviews.author: Quasimodo

customer_reviews.title: Better than the best
customer_reviews.text: Better than the best. Reputable people (JH and TL) have been promoting a similar one. Sadly, that one (replaced multiple times) has an O-ring which falls off, cannot be replaced, and without which the pen is unusable. This pen is almost identical at first glance. But, it is a better design and build. So far, 100% reliable.
customer_reviews.author: Student and Teacher

customer_reviews.title: Great product and great customer service.
customer_reviews.text: This pen is built like a tank and should last a lifetime---and the folks that sell it are equally impressive. When I had a problem with the ink cartridge, Lara of Survival Life over-nighted a replacement pen to me---an ENTIRE PEN not just a new ink cartridge. When was the last time something like this has happened to you? Outstanding service!!
customer_reviews.author: AJR Jr

customer_reviews.title: Nice product.
customer_reviews.text: This is always in my pocket just in case I have to sign my Elton James ha ha ha guess you thought I'd say my elton john. But that is the other guy. Also if I ever get trapped I can pop out the window and escape from my vehicle. Nice product. Jde
customer_reviews.author: James D. Elton

customer_reviews.title: Well made
customer_reviews.text: Sturdy and long enough for tactical use. Cap clicks into place securely and stays there. Finish is nice and the pen wouldn't attract attention in a pocket. Arrived on time, as promised. I'd buy another one.
customer_reviews.author: Alan Hughes

customer_reviews.title: Great pen!
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my dad for Christmas and he loves it. The weight feels good in your hand but it's not too heavy to carry all day. Writes very nice. I'll be getting myself one soon!
customer_reviews.author: Jake

customer_reviews.title: Tacticle Pen is Un-tacticle.
customer_reviews.text: Was disappointed with product. The threaded part that holds it together doesn't work so it falls apart. The finish on the surface is also coming off. Where was the product made? China?
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: I really like this tactical pen. It's very heavy duty and has a lifetime guarantee. This company is great! They have been in touch with me to be sure I was satisfied with the pen. I am VERY impressed with how kind they have been. They even sent me a coupon code for my next purchase when I mentioned purchasing more pens.
customer_reviews.author: Dr Chas

customer_reviews.title: Nice and sturdy
customer_reviews.text: Nice and sturdy. How ever the rubber ring inside the cap keeps coming off. It's ment to hold the cap on tight. It's anoting ro put back. And comes off frequently
customer_reviews.author: joshua foley

customer_reviews.title: Super solid and writes great
customer_reviews.text: Very solid, writes very nicely with the pressurized filler and nice balance. Flat cap top makes good place to put your thumb in case you have to break something. Cap fits on top and bottom tightly, no rattle. My only criticisms are that it could look a little more pen-like and a little less "tactical," and the logo on the clip is a bit garish. However if this is the type of item you're seeking, I think this is the one to get. Only does two jobs, but does them well.
customer_reviews.author: Stacy D

customer_reviews.title: Great gift, even better tool.
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my step dad as a bday present. He loved it. I loved it so much I bought a second one for myself. It writes well and feels comfortable in your hand. Not top heavy or off balanced at all. Feels great to write for long periods of time.
customer_reviews.author: Mike Clyde

customer_reviews.title: Great Pen
customer_reviews.text: Loved it. I gave it to a friend and wanted another but apparently it's not available anymore. The cap fit snug and the flat end for your thumb made it comfortable to hold as a self defense weapon. I've seen other pens with a pointed caps and it makes no sense at all. Really want another one.
customer_reviews.author: Ken

customer_reviews.title: What a price of junk. The pens falls apart ...
customer_reviews.text: What a price of junk. The pens falls apart and when I tapped it against my desk while listening to music it split in two. You could not use this for anything.
customer_reviews.author: jason knight

customer_reviews.title: Does the job
customer_reviews.text: The tactical pen does the job I purchased it for. The top of pen becomes loose and has to be tightened every week or so. The pen itself is not good, but I didn’t purchase it for the writing utensil.
customer_reviews.author: Forgottenhero

customer_reviews.title: Great pen
customer_reviews.text: I have had a few tactical pens over the years, and have found this one to be the best so far. I like the weight of it, and it having a click on cap versus a screw on cap means you can remove or reinstall it for writing applications with ease. The pocket clip is solid and has not weekend at all. I carry this pen daily, and it is held up very well. I would recommend this item and have given some away as gifts.
customer_reviews.author: Layla S.

customer_reviews.title: Good Pen
customer_reviews.text: I have a couple of other Tac. pens, but I like this one the best. Gave one to my daughter, she likes it too. "O" ring fell pout of her's, contacted Hoffman Richter and they sent out a few new rings. Fit right in, pen is like new. Glad their "Forever Guarantee" is legit.
customer_reviews.author: RT

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic and formidable little piece of reasonably priced hardware
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic and formidable little piece of reasonably priced hardware. I am disabled and, God forbid, the need should arise, this little item gives me some peace of mind. I recommend carrying one and while you're at it, get one for the wife too. A steal at $20.00.
customer_reviews.author: dylan2k

customer_reviews.title: It is a Pen! And much much more!
customer_reviews.text: Great price, quality product and you can use a Fisher Space Pen ink refill. Not too heavy, cap stays on ez to write with. Yeah you can buy ones for 5-8 buck and I have.... cheap, clip falls off, refills don't fit waste of $. This one is a bit more expensive but worth it and yeah it does break glass!
customer_reviews.author: Haragano

customer_reviews.title: So much for the cap
customer_reviews.text: Its okay for what it is. I was worried about buying this because of the reviews about the rubber ring coming off and not being able to put the cap back on...and that's exactly what happened. It writes okay like a normal pen though, nothing amazing.
customer_reviews.author: Julie Daniels

customer_reviews.title: I love to write
customer_reviews.text: I love to write.. But I also WILL fight! Whilst I spend the preponderance of my time writing with this device, I also have utilized it for practice on my different bags (Cobra Relex, heavy bag, etc..) and have found this: Kept in right hand for augmentinting strong hand punch power is good, but knowing that you also have stabbing weapon for when right works to ensure neutralizing bad guy.. Even better.. Only drawback => It seems "wobbly" due to mid section where "pen" becomes "weapon" .. Trying to be both is QED problematic ... Thus only 4 stars...
customer_reviews.author: danturley

customer_reviews.title: Great device. Good weight
customer_reviews.text: Great device. Good weight, sturdy, and writes well. Great for self defense. Recommend purchasing the refill packs as well.
customer_reviews.author: M. Van Kleeck

customer_reviews.title: As Advertised - Greatness
customer_reviews.text: Figuring out how to separate the cap from the pen was a PIA the pia time, Beyond that it the ink cartridge wrote well, a very nice pen that I plan to have on me as a back up defensive tool and pen. You cannot go wrong!
customer_reviews.author: Nature Walk

customer_reviews.title: Great pen
customer_reviews.text: This is a great pen, no issues so far. My only problem is it's a little long for my back pocket. In the winter no problem my pad and pen go in my coat, but in the summer they go in my back pocket. I may just have to find something smaller, but I will definitely hold on to this one.
customer_reviews.author: jf

customer_reviews.title: Excellent! This pen is exactly what I needed.
customer_reviews.text: No need to bore you with repeating what all the other positive reviews have already said. Sometimes the reviews are wrong but in this case, they got it right. Very fine tactical pen. Going to buy more for Christmas presents right now.
customer_reviews.author: MS

customer_reviews.title: 50 / 50 Chance
customer_reviews.text: My first one was great! had it about a year before TSA confiscated it as a "martial arts weapon". Yeah write..ha ha! The second one lasted about two months before the O ring in the cap blew out. now the cap wont stay on. So no good anymore.
customer_reviews.author: Christopher O'Rourke

customer_reviews.title: nice aesthetics. Provides peace of mind while traveling by ...
customer_reviews.text: Solid construction, nice aesthetics. Provides peace of mind while traveling by air. I did have a new TSA agent look at it funny one time, but the more experienced supervisor looked at him like he was stupid and they passed it right through. I should point out that I fly often and 1 out of ~20 trips that I've taken with it is excellent statistically.
customer_reviews.author: J. P. Girard

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic quality! I never expect multi-purpose tools like this to perform well in both functions but this not only has a sturdy build more than capable of breaking glass/serving as a self defense weapon, it also writes fantastically. Originally bought this to keep in my car but now I bring it into the office with me every morning and use as my note jotting pen. Highly recommend, I'll be purchasing another one.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The Perfect Tactical Pen!
customer_reviews.text: This is simply the best tactical pen on the market. I fly with it, use it daily in business meetings, and no one is the wiser in terms of what hiding in plain sight! I give these away when I teach women's defense classes, and I ensure my wide and college aged children have them everywhere they go. I've tried many other tactical pens, but this is the one that ticks all of the boxes!!
customer_reviews.author: James LeGrand

customer_reviews.title: Design flaw?  Solid pen otherwise.
customer_reviews.text: Good solid pen but the pen part keeps unscrewing in my pocket. I don't know why but the pen has a tendency to just start unscrewing. More than once I have pulled out pen pieces from my pocket. Beyond that it is a really good pen. I love the feel and have no doubt it will hold up.
customer_reviews.author: JB

customer_reviews.title: Pulled it apart and now it won't sty back together.
customer_reviews.text: Fifth time I pulled it apart to use the pen, the "O" ring holding the pen inside the main housing came out and won't go back. Now the thing won't stay together. So, for all intents and purposes it is worthless.
customer_reviews.author: Wayne

customer_reviews.title: Get one... or more.
customer_reviews.text: I have bought six of these pens to give to family members. They write very well, and they are great self-defense tools, for when you can't carry something more lethal. My daughter is stationed in Italy, and flies back and forth. She hasn't had a problem.
customer_reviews.author: D. Benson

customer_reviews.title: loose cap
customer_reviews.text: loose pen cap, rattles when put on either end, i would like it to be silent when in my shirt pocket and walking.
customer_reviews.author: rob

customer_reviews.title: So it seemed like a solid pen wrote well and looks pretty strong
customer_reviews.text: So it seemed like a solid pen wrote well and looks pretty strong. However it kept unscrewing its self apart in my pocket and not for some reason the pen cartage inside slips further out the hole then it should and makes a lot of noise. Probably still ok for breaking windows but not good for writing any more. :/
customer_reviews.author: Vermont_Nord

customer_reviews.title: this is a great pen. I've used it for over a month ...
customer_reviews.text: Overall, this is a great pen. I've used it for over a month now and am very happy with it. It's a lot thicker and a little longer than a normal pen but it still fits in the front pocket of a shirt. It's slightly top heavy when writing but perfectly balanced if you leave the cap off. I've also carried it through TSA check points numerous times with no issues.
customer_reviews.author: S. StoneSt.

customer_reviews.title: Weak Tool
customer_reviews.text: Threading on the pen doesn't have a tight tolerance and can pull apart or bend and pulled apart. I didn't use the pen often but after the short time i owned it, the ink ran out. The tip used to break the window was initially damaged but was still able to be used. The tip of the tool is not very strong and will flatten out. Forget about the Titanium Coating, find something made from stainless steel.
customer_reviews.author: Kent Randles

customer_reviews.title: Great EDC item
customer_reviews.text: Great EDC item, I have owned several pens of this type and this is my favorite. I have client meetings throughout the day, sometimes in schools, and this never gets a second look. Makes me feel better knowing I have something to give myself an advantage if needed besides my rugged good looks.
customer_reviews.author: Mildot

customer_reviews.title: Great customer service
customer_reviews.text: I love this pen and carry it daily. I did have one problem; the o-ring that keeps the cap in place failed and deformed so I couldn't reuse it. I contacted Amazon to see if I could order a replacement. Amazon couldn't help, but a representative of the manufacturer noticed the exchange and contacted me. After a couple of emails she sent me a half dozen o-rings and now my pen is as good as new. Really awesome.
customer_reviews.author: Dave K

customer_reviews.title: True tactical survival pen.
customer_reviews.text: This pen met every thing for my expectations not only that this pen definetly feels and looks like a true survival especially with the glass breaker tip. Not joke this pen is definitly a aircraft grade product unlike the imitation pens ou there.
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: back part easily comes off?
customer_reviews.text: not sure about how easy it is for the back cover to pop off. not sure why it has to be a pen. why not just make it one solid aluminum piece? it's just a weapon anyway. commit to that concept.
customer_reviews.author: Grant Brown

customer_reviews.title: My favorite budget pen.
customer_reviews.text: I've owned many of these "tactical pens". This one, especially for the price, is my favorite by far. I've used it daily for almost a year and a half. The screw on cap pens are such a pain. I like that I can just snap this one on. I've been through 4 refills in that time. The original refill didn't last long.
customer_reviews.author: JDK

customer_reviews.title: Excellent pen if you forgive the fact that there are ...
customer_reviews.text: Excellent pen if you forgive the fact that there are only 1-2 rows of threats that grab when the 2 halves are screwed to geather. Mine stripped out with in the first 3 months. Now i have 2 half that no longer screw together.
customer_reviews.author: Shannon Phillips

customer_reviews.title: Nice pen with clean lines
customer_reviews.text: Nice pen with clean lines. As a female I love having something practical, like a pen, that can also, in worst case scenarios, help me protect myself or break the window(s) in my car. The pen fits well in my hand and I will take it with me on all trips.
customer_reviews.author: MHH

customer_reviews.title: Great pen
customer_reviews.text: Great tac pen. Good heft and weight. Cap is secure and works well. Haven't had issues I have seen in other reviews. Been using it for several weeks now with no complaints. Also, recently flew with it and TSA had no issues.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Workman

customer_reviews.title: Threads wore down almost immediately.
customer_reviews.text: Threads on the pen wore down after a very short time. It is now unusable. I wouldn't buy this again. Looking for a better quality pen.
customer_reviews.author: Roswell630

customer_reviews.title: Superior comparison, very nice quality
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this one and a different one to make a comparison on my own, I love this one the most. The pen cartridge is a good one also.
customer_reviews.author: George S.

customer_reviews.title: Well built, writes well.
customer_reviews.text: This pen would really ruin someone's day if they were to be struck with it. Built well, writes well. Tsa legit, carried it on 5 airplanes as of now, many more to come as I travel for work at least 20 times a year. When I go thru tsa, I just have it in pen mode in my carry on, so far, no issues at all.
customer_reviews.author: Jaxsey X. Wells

customer_reviews.title: Outstanding Product
customer_reviews.text: I am not sure about the tactical function since I have not had and hope to never have a need to use it but it functions well as a writing instrument. My only reservation maybe that people with small hands may find it difficult to use as a writing instrument but let's face it, that is not its primary purpose. Overall outstanding product all around.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer
